Enemy Adjacent.description: Placing a unit on a territory connected to a territory controlled by a different player

Ally Adjacent.description: Placing a unit on a territory connected to a territory controlled by the same player

Border Adjacent.description: Placing a unit in a territory that borders a country in a different continent

Connection Bias.description: Placing a unit on a territory with connections to multiple other countries, +value per connection

Placement Bias Multiplier.description: Placing a unit where there already are other units, +value per army

Ally Adjacent.description: Attacking a territory connected to another territory controlled by the attacking player

Border Adjacent.description: Attacking a territory on the border of a different continent

Capture Continent.description: Attacking a territory that will give this player control over all territories on a continent if the attack is successful

Destroy Bias.description: Estimated amount of defending units destroyed, +value per unit

Remain Bias.description: Estimated amount of attacking units destroyed, -value per unit

Safe Threshold.description: Minimal amount of estimated chance of a successful attack to consider an attack safe, below this amount is considered risky

Minimal Success Chance.description: Minimal amount of estimated chance of successful attack necessary for an attack to be considered viable

Minimal Remaining Percent.description: The amount of units lost before calling off an attack, expressed as a percentage of the amount of units at the start of the attack

Enemy Adjacent.description: Moving a unit on a territory connected to a territory controlled by a different player

Ally Adjacent.description: Moving a unit on a territory connected to a territory controlled by the same player

Border Adjacent.description: Moving a unit in a territory that borders a country in a different continent

Bigger Territory.description: Moving units onto a territory with more units.

Smaller Territory.description: Moving units onto a territory with fewer units.

Connection Bias.description: Moving a unit on a territory with connections to multiple other countries, +value per connection

Base Transfer Rate.description: Base percentage of units to transfer should it be necessary

Risky Transfer Rate.description: Percentage of units to transfer if the movement is considered risky

Safe Transfer Rate.description: Percentage of units to transfer if the movement is considered safe
